issue.title: [IR] [C++] Make join predicate a list of expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14142](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14142). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a desire to make the join expression be a list of predicates (currently it's a single expression) that is implicitly a conjunction per https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/pull/2331.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14142?focusedCommentId=17585798) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
